snippet: GROSS--Ronald M. The Board of Directors of 125 East 63rd Street is deeply saddened by the passing of its member, Ronald M. Gross. Ron was a longtime resident of the building and the retired Chairman and CEO of Rayonier, Inc., an international forest products company. He also was a director of Lukens Steel, Brinks, Inc. and Corn Products International. We extend our condolences to his wife, Grecia, his children and grandchildren. The family has requested that, in lieu of flowers, donations be made to charity. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GROSS--Ronald M. The Board of Directors of 125 East 63rd Street is deeply saddened by the passing of its member, Ronald M. Gross. Ron was a longtime resident of the building and the retired Chairman and CEO of Rayonier, Inc., an international forest products company. He also was a director of Lukens Steel, Brinks, Inc. and Corn Products International. We extend our condolences to his wife, Grecia, his children and grandchildren. The family has requested that, in lieu of flowers, donations be made to charity. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GROSS, RONALD M
